LanguageData.Firefighter.label: Firefight
LanguageData.Patient.label: Patient
LanguageData.Patient.description: Go to a medical bed for treatment if you have an immediately life-threatening health condition.
LanguageData.Doctor.label: Doctor
LanguageData.Doctor.description: Treat the sick, bring them food, cheer them up, and perform assigned surgeries. Doctors will care for both colonists and prisoners.
LanguageData.PatientBedRest.label: Bed rest
LanguageData.PatientBedRest.description: Rest in bed to recuperate from not-immediately-life-threatening medical problems.
LanguageData.BasicWorker.label: Basic
LanguageData.BasicWorker.description: Unskilled and easy tasks. Release prisoners and flick switches on machines.
LanguageData.Warden.label: Warden
LanguageData.Warden.description: Manage, feed, chat with, and recruit prisoners.
LanguageData.Handling.label: Handle
LanguageData.Handling.description: Tame, train, harvest resources from and slaughter animals.
LanguageData.Cooking.label: Cook
LanguageData.Hunting.label: Hunt
LanguageData.Hunting.description: Kill animals which are designated to be hunted.
LanguageData.Construction.label: Construct
LanguageData.Construction.description: Build things that you've designated, and fix damaged or broken-down buildings.
LanguageData.Growing.label: Grow
LanguageData.Growing.description: Plant seeds, harvest crops, and forage for wild plants.
LanguageData.Mining.label: Mine
LanguageData.PlantCutting.label: Plant cut
LanguageData.PlantCutting.description: Cut or harvest plants as designated.
LanguageData.Smithing.label: Smith
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Create weapons and tools from raw materials, either as a blacksmith or by machining.
LanguageData.Tailoring.label: Tailor
LanguageData.Art.label: Art
LanguageData.Art.description: Create beautiful works of art from raw materials.
LanguageData.Crafting.label: Craft
LanguageData.Crafting.description: Do general low-skilled labor at work stations. This includes stonecutting, smelting, and more.
LanguageData.Hauling.label: Haul
LanguageData.Hauling.description: Carry things to where they need to be.
LanguageData.Cleaning.label: Clean
LanguageData.Cleaning.description: Clear snow and clean the floor in the home area.
LanguageData.Research.label: Research
